Sentencas: Solid carbon was investigated as the fuel for an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: A new carbon fuel cell with high power output by integrating with in situ catalytic reverse Boudouard reaction

Sentencas: An innovative, indirect operating method involving internal catalytic gasification of carbon to gaseous carbon monoxide via the reverse Boudouard reaction (C(s) + CO2(g) -> 2CO(g)) was proposed.
Titulo: A new carbon fuel cell with high power output by integrating with in situ catalytic reverse Boudouard reaction

Sentencas: The carbon gasification reaction rate was greatly enhanced by adopting FemOn-MxO (M = Li, K, Ca) as a catalyst.
Titulo: A new carbon fuel cell with high power output by integrating with in situ catalytic reverse Boudouard reaction

Sentencas: A peak power density of similar to 297 mW cm(-2) was achieved at 850 degrees C for an anode-supported SOFC with scandium-stabilized zirconia electrolyte and a La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 cathode by applying a catalyst-loaded, activated carbon as fuel.
Titulo: A new carbon fuel cell with high power output by integrating with in situ catalytic reverse Boudouard reaction

Sentencas: This peak power density was only modestly lower than that obtained using gaseous hydrogen as the fuel.
Titulo: A new carbon fuel cell with high power output by integrating with in situ catalytic reverse Boudouard reaction
